bwwExcerpt: What’s the funniest musical that you can think of? ‘Spamalot’? ‘Hairspray’? ‘Mean Girls’? All worthy contenders, for sure. Yet, I laughed harder — and certainly more often — during opening night of ‘Shucked’ at the Curran Theatre in San Francisco than I did while watching any of those other entirely worthy productions.
